name: Nana's Words
description:
A game for PlayJam with the theme "Something's Missing".

*This game was created under time pressure and the end result is more a proof of concept than an actual proper game. I still think it's worth playing though, anyway, it's free :)

The brain is a complex organ we don't understand very well at all. Sometimes people can recollect beautiful stories from their past but struggle to access the part of their brain that finds the right words to share them.

That can be frustrating and embarrassing.  But, with a little help, those stories can come back to life once again.

Dedicated to Nel.

Install guide

  • Simulator: Using the Playdate Simulator
  • Playdate hardware: Sideloading a game on the Playdate console

Created by

Jerry Verhoeven @JerryVerhoeven

More

If you enjoyed this little game, please consider supporting me by buying my other game: Cranky Bird. It's more fun than donating to this project because then you'll get a whole 'nother game! Score!
